captions.text: How does CLC react to the hook?
Lovely dance move to break free!
Crystal clear!
Hello, this is CLC

It's an honor to be on Let's Dance
since we debuted only a while ago
Our group name CLC stands for Crystal Clear
which describes the members' charms
The title song "PePe" is about guys who keep us on the hook
It's a retro dance track with fun lyrics warning the guys
We'll teach you how to break free from the hook!
Let's dance!
Step 1. Stop shaking up my heart!
The Penguin Dance!
Have you ever been kept on the hook?
When the guy's nice to you all the time...
making you feel special by treating you differently?
Oh, you mean like when he acts different around you?
So you start expecting things to go well between you two
but then you find out he does that to everyone... how would you feel?
Oh no, I've been fooled!
I hate guys who keep me on the hook
We've been foolish enough to let the smallest things shake us up
Thinking about it makes you mad, right?
Then join us and forget all about it!
How?
Let's dance!
Wiggle wiggle wiggle
Spread your arms out and wiggle to the right
Tilt your head to the side
Repeat one more time
Slide down
while bringing your right hand up
Poke one, two, three, four times
Penguin Dance complete!
Penguin Dance
Step 2. Is it a go? Or no? So confusing!
Confused Dance!
Guys, I have a question
Let's say you like a guy
And you've hung out with him a couple times
You even held hands with him, but he hasn't asked you out yet
What do you think?
I know
It's definitely something
Like you said, you held hands!
No way, he's keeping you on the hook
Isn't he? Could he be serious?
How confusing!
Remember how we learned the moves we're about to share from Rain?
He told me that this guy is 100% keeping you on the hook
When a guy likes you, he won't leave you confused
Don't mistake the hook for something else!
Let's dance!
Hold your confused head
Bounce up and down three times
Oops! Cover your mouth then twist to the right
Repeat the moves while walking forward
Confused Dance complete!
Confused Dance
Step 3. Caught in action!
Shutter Dance
Let's mention a few things about guys who keep girls on hooks
They don't want to keep the girls, but they don't want to give them up!
They keep evaluating the girls
Click!
Guys who check their text messages but take forever to reply
Then one day they just randomly answer!
Click!
Guys who are nice to every girl on the planet!
Click!
Ugh, makes me mad to listen to this!
Let's remember to never date these kinds of guys!
Hey, how about we go find these guys ourselves?
We can be like paparazzi!
Sounds fun, I'm in!
It's on!
Let's dance!
Click! Jump as cutely as possible!
Again, jump to the shutter click!
Jump to the opposite side
Shutter Dance complete!
Shutter Dance

Point Choreography 1
Penguin Dance

Point Choreography 2
Confused Dance

Point Choreography 3
Shutter Dance
